name: DAB
description:
D.A.B. (Dancing Animal Battle) is a dance battle royale where the last animal left dancing wins. Put your dance skills to the test in this 100 animal battle where accuracy, rhythm, and raw dance power will be needed to make it out alive.

WASD for some sick dance moves

SPACE to activate your dance power (only at full meter)

Q and E to cycle through targets for your dance power
